snippet.title: One Direction Boys Smoking Weed and Joking About Drug Use! WATCH VIDEO!

localized.description:
More Celebrity News ►► http://bit.ly/SubClevverNews
Is Ariana Grande the Next Big Pop Star?►►http://bit.ly/1tMtqzB

Zayn Malik and Louis Tomlinson are in a bit of hot water, as a video of them talking about drugs and allegedly smoking weed has surfaced. The shocking video -- that was recorded back in April by the way-- was released by the Daily Mail, and features the One Direction "boy banders" in a car with a couple of unknown pals, and as they drive, Louis mentions "Leaving Peru, joint lit, happy days."
He then turns the camera to his band mate Zayn, and we see that a police motorcycle drives up to them as they pass the alleged joint around in the vehicle. Louis mentiones the police presence later saying: 'He's having a look. He's thinking, "I'm sure I can smell an illegal substance in there." And he's hit the nail on the head'.
Let's take another look:
Though, Zayn starts singing about Mary J. Blige, many are assuming that he's not actually singing about her, but rather using the popular marijuana nickname -- Mary Jane. Shocker.
The video goes on showing them smoking and talking about weed where they cuss, laugh, and discuss their other band mates. We're not sure how The Daily Mail obtained this footage, but it's pretty obvious Louis was the one recording.
Pretty interesting stuff, but Miley Cyrus has been open about her love of weed for quite some time, so it looks like they all have something in common now?
What do you think of this video? Are you shocked? Or did you kind of expect to see something like this surface eventually? Start the conversation in the comments section below, then click right over here to watch the newest episode of our show Totally Clevver. I'm Erin Robinson, thanks so much for watching Clevver News. We'll see you around!
